parameters: My items are fresh from none other than the dreaded Demons' Spire itself!
The price is 3,000 Gold. No more, no less!
If you don't like it, leave!
Heh heh heh... 3,000 Gold, in the bank...
What the hell are you talking about?! That's a damn insult of an offer!
Listen, slut! I bought you for a whopping 500 Gold!
Disobey me again, and I'll prevent you from cumming for a whole MONTH!
Y- Yes, Mistress! I'm so, so sorry, Mistress~!!
I beg for your forgiveness! I'm a lowly slut and your obedient property~! ♥♥
W- Wow... I never realized puppets could be so...
Oho! It may not be high art, but it certainly is entertaining~!! Make her dance again!!
Not bad, not bad at all...
I wonder if she'd part with it for a decent price...?
Mistress likes the puppet show, so I do, too~! ♥♥
I wasn't really sure what to do after finding Jatek...
Wanna see? For you, it's free~!
Hi again~! Want to see the show after all?
Hi there~! Want to see my show again, maybe?
All right - Don't be a stranger~!
She may look like just a puppet, but don't let looks fool you - she's a dancer, too~!
Wow... What a realistic-looking Avian puppet!

\!
Thank you so very much for your purchase!
In truth, I do not know the purpose of such an object as that card, but a box of them was being taken to the Demons' Spire by a band of demons.
I was able to take it from them, luckily, but I shall tell you what they said...
They said, "The Great Queen told us to guard these with our lives and to bring them to her immediately if we found it."
"Whatever you do, don't rip a single one of them apart. That uses up its magic, and the Queen will have your head for it."
Then they laughed, though I did not understand the joke...
Please, good buyer... Use it wisely.
Had a taste of how nasty the world is out there and come running back to your Mistress? Just put the collars on and let me take control...
Well, hello there, my lost looking lambs! My... It is a rarity to see such fine young ladies walking so freely around the Sea Market.
Many of my peers would seek to force a collar on you and you’d be up on the auction block and then who knows... A Forestkin slave? A stone ornament? An Orc egghole?
My dears, let me save you from such humiliations! Become my loving thralls and continue your adventure under the careful guidance of me, your new Mistress!
It won’t cost you anything more than your tenuous grip on your freedom and trust me, I treat my slaves better than most!
Don’t even think about it too hard, my sweet, just say yes and slip on my collars. You know it’ll feel good and it’s what you want, deep down...
What a smart little thing you are! Just for that, I promise I’ll at least try to keep your mind at least mostly intact!
Now, just follow me and we’ll continue this silly little quest of yours. Just make sure you obey my orders or else... Well, I’ll have to put that mind of yours in time out!
Really? Huh... Well, I’ll be waiting here when you change your mind. Trust me. They always come back...
